item.title: Talks
item.description: Your can find most of our past talks, and much more, on our Youtube Channel Upcoming talks AGU Fall meeting 2022 - Dec 12th-16th You can find all the talks and posters our members will be giving at the AGU Fall meeting in our most recent newsletter. You can also download the schedule for the talks by following this link.
